pullrequest.title: save configuration to the default location on exit

content.raw:
Thank you for the pull request!

Both RViz and rqt open a confirmation dialog, what do you think of adding one here too?

![rvizsave.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/804444820-rvizsave.png)

If we want to get fancy, we could add a check-box so the user can choose to "Never ask again", but then we need to store that somewhere, maybe an ini file. We can ticket an issue for this and tackle it in the future.
